actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act to authorize establishment of the Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site, North Dakota and Montana."

summary.text: Increases the size of the Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site, North Dakota and Montana, by 170 acres. Increases the amount authorized to be used for land acquisition and development of such site to $8,500,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act to authorize establishment of the Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site, North Dakota and Montana."
